user_query: I'm organizing a company event and I want to promote it on Instagram. Can you search for users who have the word 'event' in their username and provide me with their profile details? Additionally, fetch the top 5 trending hashtags related to events and the user tags posts associated with these hashtags.

TaskList.description: Search for users on Instagram who have the word 'event' in their username and retrieve their profile details.
Fetch the top 5 trending hashtags related to events.
Get posts associated with the fetched trending hashtags and collect user tags from those posts.
